entry.title: Flash Flood Warning issued August 02 at 1:07AM CDT until August 02 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHERN JASPER AND NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 105 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported flash flooding across the warned area. Between 3 and 10 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
